Docs.summary: Provides extension methods for the and for document navigation.

Docs.param: The document from which the XPath navigator is created.
Docs.summary: Creates a new XPath navigator object for navigating the specified document.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator CreateNavigator (this System.Xml.XmlNode node);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator CreateNavigator(class System.Xml.XmlNode node) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function CreateNavigator (node As XmlNode) As XPathNavigator
static member CreateNavigator : System.Xml.XmlNode -> System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator

Docs.param: The node where the navigator is initially positioned.
Docs.summary: Creates an XPath navigator for navigating the specified node.
Docs.returns: An XPath navigator object used to navigate the node. The XPath navigator is positioned on the node from which the method is called, not on the root of the document.

Docs.param: The document from which the XPath navigator is created.
The node where the navigator is initially positioned.
Docs.summary: Creates an XPath navigator object for navigating the specified document positioned on the specified node.

Docs.param: The node where the navigator is initially positioned.

Docs.param: The node where the navigator is initially positioned.
A namespace manager to resolve XPath expression prefix namespaces.
Docs.summary: Selects a list of nodes matching the specified XPath expression. Any prefixes found in the XPath expression are resolved using the supplied namespace manager.
Docs.returns: A collection of nodes that match the specified XPath expression.
